Class TreatmentInformation

java.lang.Object

          gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.TreatmentInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExpeditedAdverseEventReportChild, gov.nih.nci.cabig.ctms.domain.DomainObject, gov.nih.nci.cabig.ctms.domain.GridIdentifiable, gov.nih.nci.cabig.ctms.domain.MutableDomainObject, java.io.Serializable
public class TreatmentInformation
extends AbstractExpeditedReportSingleChild
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents the TreatmentInformation domain object associated with the Adverse event report.

Author:
Rhett Sutphin, Biju Joseph
